document.full_text: while this year's tony award nominees won't be announced until tuesday, a tony oversight panel announced an unusually long list of decisions on friday about the eligibility of several broadway actors.
document.title: some actors move up, others down, in jockeying for tony consideration
lines_and_colors: while this year's tony award nominees won't be announced until tuesday, a tony oversight panel announced an unusually long list of decisions on friday about the eligibility of several broadway actors.
